Reviews.Title: “Awful.”

Reviews.Content: travel business im easy please clean shower sleep bathroom takes lot bad review guy checked nice toilet sheets towels paper thin clean free wifi signal bad couch smelled musty towel sitting couldnt close bathroom window latch broken shower filthy didnt drain stood ankle deep water youre lucky suite downtown skyline distance adult video store look boarded motel street vinyl falling curtains light patterns morning lampshade weird water stains im assured stains wasnt bodily oriented overall ratty liked thick inch wide border ancient dust entire vacuum cleaner cant reach motel cant blamed traffic noise hwy 99 terribly loud time ive seen described wilting plastic flowers stayed couple ago nonsmoking smelled ashtray buzzing refrigerator kept night stay didnt reservation time didnt recognize name drove heart sank cheap 59 seattle awfully low youll pay didnt star ive stayed worse beat awful stay pacific motor inn springfield oregon
